ComicInfo.Title: Key of Dreams
ComicInfo.Summary: Stuck inside the Mona Lisa, Arthur, Manny, and Margot walk through the charred landscape and try to figure out what destroyed our favorite smiling painting. And outside the canvas, Margot investigates an art class gone very wrongâ€¦ Featuring new letters, new covers, and another new Silver Age-style backup story, the lost adventures of Art Brut continue here!
